name: OpenSkyCity
description:
Intro:

OpenSkyCity is a city builder and a  economy simulator, where you build and manage a city and it's cityscape.

 Here you create your own dream towns and cities with wide variety of buildings and roads and other stuff. There are lively people as well going for their daily routines. Some going for office, some for super market. Overall, this game gives you the real feel of a  living city.

Features: ✨
  • Build your city and watch it alive at day and night!
  • Spectate your friend's cities and trade with the cities.
  • Build multiplayer cities and enjoy!
Inspired by... 👵

Games like:

  • Cities: Skylines
  • Transport Fever 2
  • TheoTown
  • OpenTTD
OpenSkyCity is made using... 📂💽
  • Godot Game Engine     (proud to be  Made with Godot)
  • Blender  (Our 3D Software of choice)
  • Inkscape     (Vector Graphics)
  • GIMP  (Image editing)
Special thanks to:
  • SnailDOS
  • Blocky Arcade Studios

Thank you everyone for the support!
